alert.note: Alert for Keweenaw (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 05 at 8:58PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT ISLE ROYALE THROUGH 945 PM EDT... At 857 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mount Desor, or near Siskiwit Lake, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Siskiwit Lake, Mott Island Park Headquarters, Rock Harbor, Windigo, and Mount Desor. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until this storm passes.
